title: Woman sees purity (white discharge) along with brown, yellow discharge, is she pure? Assim al hakeem
transcript: Ella from Pakistan um my question is about a purity after meditation in return compute and it is on that there are variations in each human cycle for example um if I remember late for five days and then she gets thrown discharge for next three days and on the ninth day she's his Purity like white discharge but also she sees later grown discharge with white discharge as white discharge is a sign of priority so should she pray or skip it or and what should she do otherwise how long is this going on sorry how long is this and her period was what six days if everyone bleached for five days okay for next three days three day uh gets blown discharge okay on the eighth day she sees the sign of purity on the ninth day she sees a sign of purity associated with brown discharge yes no this is not her sign of Purity she has to say the white milky thread-like uh discharge pure without any brownish or yellowish discharge and this is what Madara Isha used to advise the women at her time she used to say Do not hasten until you see it clear and pure and Allah Knows Best
